roleset.name: bluntly honest

example.name: args 0, 2
example.text: I 'll be frank with you , I 'm getting annoyed at their continuous comments of independence yet at the same time they have it the best out of the states that make up the United Kingdom .

example.name: all args
example.text: I-1 want [*-1] to be frank with you about some of the negative dynamics that can develop around constipation.
example.arg: about some of the negative dynamics that can develop around constipation

roleset.note: Added by Julia based on BOLT.
